UM01 — Arrogant Arcanist PCS WU WU 2 Creature - Human Wizard 1/1 2 Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying (This creature can’t be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Arrogant Arcanist enters the battlefield, return target spell with mana value less than or equal to the number of creatures you control to its owner’s hand.
UM02 — Corpse Knight PCS WB WB 2 Creature - Zombie Knight 2/2 2 Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life.
UM04 — Armed Troops PCS WG 1GW 3 Creature - Human Knight */3 2 When Armed Troops enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human Knight creature token. Armed Troops’s power is equal to the number of creatures you control.
UM10 — Rubblebelt Shaman PCS RG RG 2 Creature - Human Shaman 1/2 2 T: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells. When you spend this mana to cast a creature spell, it enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter.
CW06 — Charging Commander PCS W 1WW 3 Creature - Elf Soldier 2/3 2 Whenever one or more other creatures you control attack, Charging Commander gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
CW08 — Charismatic Tactician PCS W 2W 3 Creature - Human Advisor 2/2 2 When Charismatic Tactician enters the battlefield, scry 2. If you control three or more creatures, draw a card instead. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
CW09 — Basri's Acolyte PCS W 2WW 4 Creature - Cat Cleric 2/3 2 Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) When Basri’s Acolyte enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures you control.
CW10 — Guild Taskmaster PCS W 3W 4 Creature - Human Warrior 2/2 2 Once each turn, whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Guild Taskmaster.
CW12 — Regal Guardian PCS W 5W 6 Creature - Human Soldier 4/4 2 Vigilance (Attacking doesn’t cause this creature to tap.) When Regal Guardian enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. Then, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.
CW16 — Defiant Strike PCS W W 1 Instant 3 Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

CU04 — Frost Lynx PCS U 2U 3 Creature - Elemental Cat 2/2 2 When Frost Lynx enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.
CU05 — Crustacean Monstrosity PCS U 1UU 3 Creature - Crab Horror 2/3 2 When Crustacean Monstrosity enters the battlefield, scry 2, then each opponent mills two. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order. To mill two, each opponent put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)
